name: Luxurious Pro Network
description: LPNT (LUXURIOUS PRO NETWORK) Group is an undisputed global leader in the domain of luxurious transportation and forex trading. We are a group of companies handling a variety of business streams since marking inception in 2010. Many multibillionaire investors are already rubbing shoulder with us on the investment front. Many prominent fund managers associated with us specialize in dealing with trading in forex. Coming to the point, LPN TOKEN is the venture of LUXURIOUS PRO NETWORK Group. This Ethereum Blockchain based cryptocurrency for safe, speedy, and decentralized transactions can change the way you transact.
